text_block_list.text:
The event T.M. Opera O invited<n>Meisho Doto to is the Tracen
Meet, a<n>competition held multiple times a year<n>to both
challenge and celebrate the<n>students.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
And for our showing to be a success,<n>we must rehearse!
We shall meet on<n>the turf course tomorrow at one<n>o'clock
sharp! Ta-ta for now, Doto!<n>Hah ha ha ha!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
...Phew. Wh-what a shock... I-I think I<n>lost consciousness for
a second<n>there...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Hm? Yes, of co—huh?! D-didO-Ope...Opera O really just... ask me for something?! A-and abattle at that?! Whaaat?!

She's a lot more flustered than I<n>would've expected. Not to
mention the<n>way she was looking at T.M. Opera O<n>with so
much... admiration. Could it<n>be...
choice_data_list: Are you a fan of hers?
Are you a fan of hers?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
N-no, I don't deserve to call myself a<n>fan... It's more like...
I-I look up to her,<n>I suppose...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
M-maybe that's a bit confusing...<n>Um... W-when I first saw
Opera O at<n>our entrance ceremony...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hah ha ha! Look at these decorated<n>walls, the gilded stage,
an auditorium<n>at full capacity! Good to see the<n>school
celebrate my enrollment<n>appropriately!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
To say she stood out would be an<n>understatement. Her
laugh echoed<n>through the halls as she entered, and<n>then...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Listen well, my comrades and rivals!<n>Today, my journey
along the road to<n>victory—

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: She tripped in the middle of her<n>speech.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: A-are you okay?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Can you imagine? Tripping over yourown two feet... in front of the wholeschool... on the first day?! Iwould've had nightmares for months!But not her...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Heh... Haaah ha ha ha ha! Excellent!<n>Could there be more
crushing<n>humiliation than this?! What luck to<n>come across
such emotion so<n>serendipitously!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(Sh-she's not embarassed? In fact...<n>sh-she seems even
more majestic<n>than before... A-amazing... H-how?)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: (I-I want to be like that too!)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Opera O asking me for help... waslikely—no, probably—no, surely—no,definitely pure coincidence...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
B-but even so... if she thinks I can<n>somehow be of help to
her, I-I want to<n>do my very best!

The next day, curiosity gets the better<n>of me, and I decide to
watch Meisho<n>Doto and T.M. Opera O. However,<n>
something's amiss when I get there...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hah ha ha! To think she would be<n>thirty minutes late on our
very first<n>day!

Recalling her overall clumsiness, I<n>start to worry that she
may have<n>fallen and injured herself<n>somewhere. But just
then...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I-I'M SO SORRY!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
F-forgive me! Prepping took me a little<n>longer than I thought!
I-I'll enter the<n>gate right away! I'm so, so, soooo<n>sorry!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hold it right there, Doto. Do you truly<n>believe we can race
with you in such<n>a state?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Eep! I-I-I mean... that is... I'm sorry!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: You're still wearing your slippers.

And so, Meisho Doto rushes back to<n>the dorms to retrieve
her running<n>shoes. Just a little longer, and this<n>race can
begin...
...Or so I thought. Night has fallen.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hah ha ha ha! What incredible<n>tardiness!

Too tardy if you ask me... Surely<n>something happened this
time—

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I'm so, so, so, so, so sorry!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Really, truly! I can't even begin to<n>explain!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
W-well... I-I was so excited yesterday<n>that I decided to
polish my shoes... But<n>when I was done, I put them in a<n>
different place than usual. So when I<n>went looking...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Are they here? What about here?<n>What about over here?!
Surely they're<n>right here! Why aren't they here?!<n>WHERE
ARE THEY?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Eventually I did manage to find them,<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Th-the cleats fell off! Whyyy?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ah... I must've reapplied them too<n>many times last night...
The holes from<n>the nails are too big! B-but that<n>means...
Ohhh, I'm such an idiot!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
S-so I had to go buy new shoes,<n>which took even longer...
S-sorry<n>doesn't even begin to cover—
choice_data_list: Why didn't you just call us?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ah, y-you're right! I should've<n>just—Wait, no, it's a little late
for that<n>now! What's done is done, and I-I<n>need to make
up for being so tardy!
choice_data_list:
Well, it's a little late to race now. Should we try
again some other day?

text_block_list.text:
It's already nighttime, and surely<n>Opera O is sick of waiting.
But when I<n>look over at her, she only smiles.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Heh, a few accidents will not sway<n>the heart of the Overlord!
Besides,<n>look yonder at the moon! O how she<n>shines! She
urges us to run, so run we<n>shall!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Th-thank you, Opera O...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(Th-then for your sake, I have to at<n>least be a good running
partner! I have<n>to be useful!)

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Heh... You're showing true grit there,<n>Doto! But I will not
falter! Haaah!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Y-yaaah!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Hngyah?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
...Ha! Well, villain? Did you enjoy that<n>small sample of
my—oh? Did you trip?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm so sorry! Not only did I make<n>you wait for me until it
was pitch black<n>outside, but I couldn't even give you<n>a
proper race!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
H-how can I even begin to make this<n>up to you... Ah, I-I
know, I brought<n>th-these refreshments with me...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Although preparing this was another<n>reason I was late... I'm
sorry...

Meisho Doto hands over a hot cup of<n>coffee and all is well...
for about half a<n>second.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: This... isn't coffee, is it? Tastes more<n>like soy sauce to me!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
S-s-soy sauce?! Oh no, now I've<n>done it! Um... Uh... I-I also
brought this<n>towel, which I sprayed with a lovely<n>
fragrance! Please take it and—

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Cough, cough! T-the stench... Itburns...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: EEEK! A-are you okay?! ARE YOU<n>OKAY?! OPERA O!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Hic... Sniff... I-I can't believe Icaused the Opera O to faint...
choice_data_list: At least it wasn't anything serious.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: S-still... I thought I'd finally be usefulfor once, but in the end... all I did wascause trouble... Sniff...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I-I really am the most worthless<n>Umamusume everrr!

Doto races off, distraught by her own<n>failures. It's clear she
put a lot of<n>effort into today, so I understand why<n>she's
upset... Concerned, I race after<n>her.
